# HKDevicePlacementSide.right

**Case**

A device predominately located on the right side.

## Declaration

```swift
case right
```

## Placements

- **HKDevicePlacementSide.central**: A device predominately located near the center of the body.
- **HKDevicePlacementSide.left**: A device predominately located on the left side.
- **HKDevicePlacementSide.unknown**: The system couldn’t determine the device’s placement.
